examples: what can you help me with
responses: We provide assistance with admissions, course selection, and general inquiries.
Our services include admission guidance, course details, and more.

examples: What is the AJK IT Excellence Center Rawalakot?
responses: It is a project by the AJK government and AJK IT Board aimed at promoting digital educational excellence, capacity building of IT professionals, and fostering an ICT ecosystem in Azad Jammu and Kashmir.

examples: Where is the AJK IT Excellence Center Rawalakot located?
responses: The center is located on the 3rd Floor of Model College, Rawalakot, 12350, Kharik Bypass Road, Chandak-185101, Poonch, AJK.

examples: What courses are offered at the AJK IT Excellence Center Rawalakot?
responses: Courses include Web Design & Development, UI/UX Design, Digital Marketing, E-commerce, Cyber Security, and Mobile App Design & Development. All courses are free.

examples: What are the operational hours of the center?
responses: Monday to Friday: 8:30 AM - 6:00 PM; Sunday: 5:30 AM - 12:00 AM; Closed on Saturdays.

examples: What is the contact information for AJK IT Excellence Center or AIOU Rawalakot?
responses: Phone: 05824-960241, Email: rd_rawalakot@aiou.edu.pk, Address: Regional Centre, House no D-156, Near Allied School Housing Scheme, Mong Road, Tehsil Rawalakot, Poonch AJK.

examples: What is the objective of the Flutter & Dart course?
responses: To equip students with skills to develop cross-platform mobile apps using Flutter and Dart, including UI design, API integration, and app deployment.

examples: What are the topics covered in Week 1 of the Flutter course?
responses: Introduction to Flutter, setting up the development environment, exploring project structure, and running basic apps.

examples: What is the main goal of the Data Science and AI course?
responses: To prepare students to collect, clean, analyze data, build ML models, and deploy them, using tools like Python, PowerBI, and Hadoop.

examples: What is covered in Week 3 of the Data Science course?
responses: Installing and practicing with Python packages like NumPy, Pandas, and Matplotlib. Learning core Python syntax and solving problems.

examples: What is the focus of the Cyber Security course?
responses: To train students in ethical hacking, vulnerability assessment, penetration testing, and SOC analysis using tools like Metasploit and Wireshark.

examples: What topics are included in Week 5 of the Cyber Security course?
responses: Understanding malware types like Trojans, viruses, worms; detecting them; and performing static and dynamic malware analysis.

examples: What is the goal of the Digital Marketing course?
responses: To teach fundamentals and strategies of digital marketing including SEO, SMM, PPC, content marketing, and freelancing.

examples: What tools are used in the Digital Marketing course?
responses: Ahrefs, SEMrush, Canva, Grammarly, WordPress, Google Ads, Google Analytics, and more.

examples: What is taught in the E-Commerce course?
responses: The course teaches Amazon business models, product hunting, listing, optimization, sourcing, and freelancing with tools like Helium 10 and Jungle Scout.

examples: What are some Amazon business models discussed in the course?
responses: FBM, FBA, Private Label, Wholesale, Dropshipping, and Online Arbitrage.
